name: John WRIGHT, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Wright v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: John WRIGHT, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of April, 2011, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
18 A.3d 1093
John WRIGHT, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

April 28, 2011.
